resources.string: Do you want to enable auto suggestion feature for contact number ?
Keywords must be in comma or space separated format
"Supports multiple keywords scanning through the SMS.\nServes as an SOS app"
"Enables Priority Notification even in silent mode.\nTriggers Notification when the user configured keyword is received"
"We follow all the android best practices to protect your privacy.We never collect data.\nDesigned inline with android permission guidelines"
